entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -26.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.6°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
